talk0000:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Hm? Another Hylian, huh?


I commend you and those merchants
for making it here under these
abnormal conditions...
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:Sad_01>But the area south of <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff> is
covered by the <clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff> right now, so
visibility is extremely low.
Then there are the eyewitness reports of
<clr:0000>strange monsters<clr:ffff>. I won't think any less
of you if you call off your trip here.
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Besides, this oasis is under the protection
of us Gerudo soldiers, so you know it's
a safe place to rest and relax!
talk0001:
<sp:3:0:2:0900><snd:Painful>Urgh... These monsters are relentless...<sp:5:0:0>
<clr:0000>Where<clr:ffff> are these swarms coming from?!
talk0002:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>Let me thank you again for helping us
clear those monsters out of here!

Some of my fellow guards were slacking
off before, but ever since the battle,
everyone's regained their focus!
We won't be letting any more monsters
into this oasis!

<snd:Greeting_01>So, go relax and let the stresses of battle
melt away. We have things covered
around here.
talk0003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Sad>The area south of this oasis is cloaked in
a <clr:0000>sand shroud<clr:ffff>, and there's no end to the
reports of <clr:0000>strange monsters <clr:ffff>nearby.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>But you're safe here in <clr:0000>Kara Kara Bazaar<clr:ffff>!


<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>That's because our protection is flawless!<sp:5:0:0>
So you can relax and unwind from your
travels without a care in the world!
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>Some of the guards were slacking off
before, but they've all regained their
focus since the battle!
And now with the sand shroud gone, we
can see threats coming from farther away!

We won't be letting any more monsters
into this oasis, that's for sure.

<snd:Happy_01>So, you have nothing to worry about. Go
relax, and let the strain of battle melt off
of you.
talk0010:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>You are not welcome here.


Get lost before I misplace my spear.<sp:5:1:0>
In you.
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>It's pretty foolish for you to show up
here, Yiga.

If it weren't for the innocents around who
might flinch at the sight of blood, I would
cut you down right now.
Leave before I change my mind.
near0000: Now what are they up to?
talk0006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting>The battle against the Gibdos has
renewed our focus. We won't be letting
any more monsters into this place.
So, go relax and let the stresses of battle
melt away.
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I don't know what you think you're doing,
but you are not welcome.

Leave at once, or I will make you regret
your decision to come here.
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I've got nothing to say to the likes of you.
Get out of my sight.
talk0008:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00>A member of the Yiga Clan? What are you
doing here?

It would not be appropriate for me to cut
you down without a warning, so consider
this the warning.
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Leave at once.
talk0009:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>How dare you show yourself here.


If it were up to me, I would attack you
without a second thought.

But people come here to rest, and I do
not want to disrupt that peace if I don't
have to.
<sp:3:0:2:0900>So leave.<sp:5:1:0> Immediately.
